form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/25/2023 FORM APPROVED O.M.B. No. 1405-0015 AL FORM 230 (English) (Rev. 6-82) OF STATE APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION 50230-105 INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. All questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in dupli- cate, using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $25.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name First name Middle name MAPARA CHIMANLAL VITHALDAS 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) NONE 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) NOT APPLICABLE 4. Date of birth 5. Age 6. Place of birth (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 7 May 1906 83 yrs KADOD GUJARAT INDIA 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status INDIAN Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 10. Occupation Medical Doctor 11. Present address 13/8 SHREE HIND COOP. HOUSING RETIRED MEDICAL PRACTITIONER SOCIETY LTD. DUNCAN CAUSEWAY RIAD, STON BONBAY - 400022 INDIA 12. Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) 1 MRS. LILAVATI CHIMANLAL HAPARA (DECEASED in 1984) MAIDEN NAME - LILAVATI SUNDERLAL PAREKH. Date and place of marriage 13. Names, addresses. dates and places of birth of all children Address DATE of PLACE OF BIRTH Son CD MAPARA ARUNKOMAR CHIHANLAL BNSMORA GUJARAT 26th SEPT 1935 KADED (DECEASED in 1988) GUL.INDIA DAughter 2 SHOH JAYAMATI PRIYAVADAN BOMBAY kroo22 24th oct. 1936 -do- CHAIDEN NAME MAPARA JAYANTI CHIMANIAL) STON Son 3 MAPARA MANOJ CHIMANZAL U.S.A. CALiFORNIA 10 In SEPT H44 do- FOIA (b)(6) 14. Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow 15. Final address in the United States me to the United States % NONE FOIA (b)(6) 16. Person you intend to join (Give name, address, and relationship, 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If if any) different from 16) FOIA (b)(6) - SON 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height 1" VERTICAL SCAR ON CENTREOF WHITE 5 feet 4 inches FOREHEAD. (b) Color of eyes (d) Complexion 20. Purpose in going to the United States BAACK FAIR PERMANENT RESIDENCE 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? PERMANENTLY LOSANGELES No THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA NSN 7540-00-149-0919 Previous edition not usable
